page.title: 17RECREATION CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: {BAD EGGS One ball is needed in this game for any number of players. The person who is 'on' chooses a subject and the other players shout out their favourite part of that subject. The one who is 'on' calls one of those out and throws the ball in the air. The chosen person has to catch the ball while the others run away. Once the chosen person has the ball, he shouts 'Bad Eggs' and everybody stops. If he can hit someone with the ball, they get a bad egg and they are 'on' instead. If he fails, he gets a bad egg himself. When somebody gets two bad eggs, everyone lines up and makes a tunnel with their legs. The victim goes through and everybody 'knees' him. The game then starts again.
